## 运用实例

```perl
=pod
下列是一条蛋白质序列，请统计该序列长度、丙氨酸（A）的个数及所占的比例；

=cut

$protein_sequence = "";
$len = length($protein_sequence);
$A_count =  $protein_sequence =~ s/A/A/g;
$A_per = ($A_count/$len)*100;
print "length: $len\n";
print "the count of A: $A_count\n";
print "the percentage of A: $A_per%\n";
```


## 参考
